sections.general: consultant career overview macintosh expert with 20 years in technical and customer support roles. experience in back-end programming, relational databases and development/maintenance of complex and critical systems. wireless system design for point-to-point networks. qualifications apple certified technical coordinator technical help desk experience apple certified support professional voip/telecom installation and support apple certified associate mac integration remote systems support apple certified help desk specialist network asset management apple certified macintosh technician accomplished with mobile devices certified alvarion system specialist
